metadata.Title: SoilTemperatureSWAT
metadata.Extended description: Strategy to compute soil temperature by layers using the SWAT method (Soil and Water Assessment Tool). It applies a lagged update with a user-defined LagCoefficient and computes a damping depth as a function of bulk density, soil water content and soil profile depth. References: Neitsch, S.L., Arnold, J.G., Kiniry, J.R., Williams, J.R., King, K.W. Soil and Water Assessment Tool Theoretical Documentation, Version 2000 (http://swatmodel.tamu.edu/media/1290/swat2000theory.pdf). Component class: UNIMI.SoilT.Strategies.Soil.SoilTemperatureSWAT.
metadata.Short description: SWAT-based soil temperature profile computation with daily lagging.
